Posts.Content: Thanks for asking, luckily they did another mammogram and used more compression and didn't have to do an ultrasound. What a sigh of relief. Good luck with your next mammogram I hope yours our turns well
Posts.Title: Need a second mammogram

Posts.Content: I had my annual mammogram, I have never had anything show up on my mammograms. I was called and I need a second mammogram, I realize being 54yrs.old I am at the age a lot of people are diagnosed with breast cancer so I am very scared about the second mammogram. My question is. I had chest surgery last summer, could what they are seeing on my mammogram be scar tissue from my surgery? Any ideas will be appreciated, thanks
Posts.Title: Need a second mammogram
